revision.text: Possibly: The citizen. Being the great outline of political science; and a defence of the British constitution, from the writings of Montesquieu, Blackstone, Hume, Paley, Gibbon, &c. &c. (London : Printed for T. Cox, St. Thomas's-street, Borough; and sold by Robinsons, Paternoster-row; Millar, Bond-Street; and Owen, Piccadilly, opposite Bond-Street, 1794). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2441726~S1
